title: Winning a World Cup is all about confidence and England are building plenty - no team will enjoy taking them on in this shape
text:
England's win over Argentina was a powerful statement of intent, and has ensured that they now move onto the quarter-finals. There was also ample evidence that Eddie Jones' side is building impressively, grafting on fresh ideas and improving with every game. If they can replicate this form against France, it's difficult to see Jacques Brunel's men beating them, so a quarter-final against Australia looms. Here are five areas that I believe show why England are now serious contenders to win the World Cup:

Cool heads

My biggest criticism of this England team – and Eddie Jones’s greatest...
description: England's win over Argentina was a powerful statement of intent, and has ensured that they now move onto the quarter-finals.
